para.text: A private collection property owner shall provide adequate waste collection service, including:
Supplying waste containers to make source separation accessible for individuals discarding solid waste at the property; provided, that the containers shall:
Be capable of containing reasonably anticipated source-separated waste generated at the location; and
Bear or be near visible signage indicating the category of source- separated material by visuals or description or shall comply with a color scheme established by the Mayor;
Annually communicating information to an individual discarding solid waste at the property regarding the types of materials that must be source separated at the property; and
Ensuring annual training on the property’s source separation requirements of any janitorial staff employed at the property.
The Mayor may require a private collection property owner to submit a source separation plan outlining the steps the property owner will take to implement the requirements of this chapter.
